articles.author: Paul67
articles.description: Luis Palma’s 87th minute goal should have been enough to secure the win at our visit to Fir Park in September.  Incredibly, Motherwell’s equaliser 8 minutes later was not enough for them to take a point.  A game which couldn’t produce a goal for so long, ended with a flurry. Almost two months later, the [...]

The Scotland Under-21 netminder has just returned to the English [...]

articles.description: MOTHERWELL have played six Premiership games since Matt O’Riley claimed Celtic’s dramatic stoppage-time clincher in the champions’ 2-1 triumph at Fir Park in late September. articles.author: celtic
articles.description:
Celtic return to action after the international break with Motherwell the visitors to Celtic Park. Every Celtic fan will be hoping they can turn in a performance like the one they signed off with against Aberdeen before the players went off to play for their respective countries. That 6-0 performance was almost perfect on […]
The post Bringing in another quality striker will be on Brendan’s mind. appeared first on Celtic Fanzine.
articles.title: Bringing in another quality striker will be on Brendan’s mind.
